snippet.title: For The King II - Console Announcement
snippet.description:
For The King II will be available on Steam, Xbox One, Xbox Series S and X and PlayStation 5 from the 12th December ⚔️ 

Battle against Fahrul's tyrannical Queen alone or as a party of four players in the sequel to For The King, the massively popular turn-based roguelite tabletop RPG. Will you unravel the once beloved Queen's terrible secret? 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1676840/For_The_King_II/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10011010
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-gb/games/store/for-the-king-ii/9nvc9kwjvlt0

Join the For The King II community:
💬 For The King Discord: https://discord.com/invite/fortheking 
🐦 For The King Twitter: https://x.com/IronOakGames   
📜 For The King Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ForTheKing/
📱 For The King TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@ironoakgames
